sentences.sContent: We recoil in horror from the thought of subjecting someone to extreme pain.
sentences.sCn: 想到要让一个人经受极度的痛苦，我们就会恐惧地退缩。

sentences.sContent: ...his small body jerking in recoil from the volume of his shouting.
sentences.sCn: …他小小身体在他大声的叫喊中畏缩地抽搐着。

trans.tranOther: to move back suddenly and quickly from something you do not like or are afraid of
